assignments.description: Assigns an existing patient schedule id to the variable
assignments.name: Assign_existing_Patient_Vaccine_Schedule_Id
assignments.label: Assign existing Patient Vaccine Schedule Id

assignments.description: Collection of Immunization Records to be created based on the Vaccine Schedule
assignments.name: Immunization_Records_Collection
assignments.label: Immunization Records Collection

assignments.description: For each dose prepare an immunization record
assignments.name: Prepare_Immunization_Record
assignments.label: Prepare Immunization Record

choices.description: Allows user create a new Vaccine Schedule
choices.name: CreateNewVaccineSchedule

decisions.description: Determines if the Users is Creating a new Vaccine Schedule or continuing with an existing one
decisions.name: Choose_New_or_Existing_Vaccine_Schedule
decisions.label: Choose New or Existing Vaccine Schedule

decisions.description: Checks if the User has already set a Vaccination Site
decisions.name: User_has_current_Vaccination_Site_set
decisions.label: User has current Vaccination Site set

Flow.description: Vaccine Administration flow using Vaccine Schedule

dynamicChoiceSets.description: Vaccine Schedules Current Assigned to the patient
dynamicChoiceSets.name: choiceCurrentPatientVaccineSchedule

dynamicChoiceSets.description: Displays all active batch numbers for this Vaccination Site
dynamicChoiceSets.name: ChooseActiveBatchNumber

Flow.interviewLabel: Vaccine Administration. Name: {!oPatientRecord.Name} Date of Birth: {!oPatientRecord.HealthCloudGA__BirthDate__pc} . Date: {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}
Flow.label: Vaccine Administration

loops.description: Loops through the Vaccine Schedule Doses associated with a Vaccine schedule
loops.name: Loop_Vaccine_Schedule_Doses
loops.label: Loop Vaccine Schedule Doses

recordCreates.description: Creates the appropriate number of EHR Immunization records using the Immunization Records Collection Assignment as its source
recordCreates.name: Create_Immunization_Records
recordCreates.label: Create Immunization Records

recordCreates.description: Creates a new Patient Vaccine Schedule
recordCreates.name: Create_New_Vaccine_Schedule_for_Patient
recordCreates.label: Create New Vaccine Schedule for Patient

recordLookups.description: Get the record details of the Patients Existing Vaccine Schedule
recordLookups.name: Get_Existing_Patient_Vaccine_Schedule
recordLookups.label: Get Existing Patient Vaccine Schedule

recordLookups.description: Gets all Vaccine Schedules Associate with the Patient
recordLookups.name: Get_Patient_Vaccine_Schedules
recordLookups.label: Get Patient Vaccine Schedules

recordLookups.description: Gets the Vaccine Product Id of selected Vaccine Schedule
recordLookups.name: Get_Selected_Vaccine_Schedule_Product
recordLookups.label: Get Selected Vaccine Schedule Product

recordLookups.description: Gets a list of all active Vaccine Schedules
recordLookups.name: List_All_Vaccine_Schedules
recordLookups.label: List All Vaccine Schedules

recordLookups.description: Retrieves the Asset records associated with the Users Vaccination Site Account. The Asset record contains the Batch Number which will be recorded against the Immunization record
recordLookups.name: oAssetRecords
recordLookups.label: Get Asset Records

recordLookups.description: Get Doses associated with the selected Vaccine Schedule
recordLookups.name: oGetVaccineScheduleDose
recordLookups.label: GetVaccineScheduleDoses

recordLookups.description: Select the Vaccine to be Administered to the Patient
recordLookups.name: Select_Vaccine_to_be_Administered
recordLookups.label: Select Vaccine to be Administered

fields.name: txtDisplayVaccineDetails
fields.fieldText:
Administer: {!Select_Vaccine_to_be_Administered.HealthCloudGA__VaccineTypeLabel__c}

Dose: {!Select_Vaccine_to_be_Administered.HealthCloudGA__DoseQuantityValue__c}

Route: {!Select_Vaccine_to_be_Administered.HealthCloudGA__RouteLabel__c}


Details

Vaccine Schedule: {!Get_Selected_Vaccine_Schedule_Product.Name} {!Get_Existing_Patient_Vaccine_Schedule.Name}

Sequence: Dose {!Select_Vaccine_to_be_Administered.vxDose_Sequence__c} of {!Get_Selected_Vaccine_Schedule_Product.Number_of_Doses__c} {!Get_Existing_Patient_Vaccine_Schedule.Number_of_Doses__c}

Planned Administration Date: {!Select_Vaccine_to_be_Administered.vxPlanned_Administration_Date__c}

Current Administration Status: {!Select_Vaccine_to_be_Administered.vxStatus__c}


To proceed with recording the vaccination you must check the consent tick box below.

fields.name: chkConsentObtained
fields.fieldText: {!oPatientRecord.Name} has given consent to be administered {!oSelectedVaccineProduct.Name}

fields.name: Product_Not_Found
fields.fieldText: Either no Vaccine Product is associated with this Vaccine Schedule or the Product is not Active. Please contact your administrator

fields.name: Choose_New_or_Existing_Schedules
fields.fieldText: Choose New or Existing Vaccine Schedule

fields.name: Completed_Message
fields.fieldText: {!Select_Vaccine_to_be_Administered.HealthCloudGA__VaccineTypeLabel__c} has been recorded as administered to {!oPatientRecord.Name}

fields.name: NoDefaultVaccinationSite
fields.fieldText: No Default Vaccination Site has been set for this User. Ensure a Vaccination Site Resource record exists for this User

fields.name: errNoVaccineSchedules
fields.fieldText: No Vaccine Schedules have been set up. Please create a Vaccine Schedule record and at least one Vaccine Schedule Dose record

subflows.description: Checks current user is a assigned to vaccination site
subflows.name: Assign_User_Vaccination_Site
subflows.label: Assign User Vaccination Site

textTemplates.name: txtConsentObtained
textTemplates.text: {!oPatientRecord.Name} has given consent to be vaccinated.

textTemplates.name: txtConsentText
textTemplates.text: By checking this box {!oPatientRecord.Name} is confirmed their consent to be vaccinated with {!oSelectedVaccineProduct.Name}

textTemplates.name: txtObtainConsentInstructions
textTemplates.text: Toggle to indicate {!oPatientRecord.Name} has given consent to be vaccinated with {!oSelectedVaccineProduct.Name}

variables.description: If true consent have been obtained
variables.name: bConsentObtained

variables.description: The Default Vaccination Site the current is assigned to
variables.name: oAssignedVaccinationSite

variables.description: Collection for Immunization Records prepped prior to commit
variables.name: oImmunizationRecords

variables.description: Object holding the Patient Vaccine Schedule
variables.name: oNewPatientVaccineSchedule

variables.description: Holds Patient Record Fields need for this flow
variables.name: oPatientRecord

variables.description: Vaccine Product that is associated with the Vaccine Schedule
variables.name: oSelectedVaccineProduct

variables.description: Collection of Vaccine Schedule Dose records
variables.name: oVaccineScheduleDoses

variables.description: Details of the Vaccine Schedule Selected
variables.name: oVaccineScheduleSelectedDetails

variables.description: Asset Record Id select on Vaccination Administration screen
variables.name: varSelectedAssetId

variables.description: The option selected as the Site of Administration of the Vaccine
variables.name: varSelectedSiteOfAdministration
